item.title: Trump-Backed GENIUS Act Under Fire: NYAG Urges Tougher Stablecoin Rules Before July Vote
item.description:
Attorney General Letitia James has cautioned Congress that the GENIUS Act, which mandates full reserve backing for stablecoins, still lacks robust investor and national-security protections; she has pressed for FDIC-like insurance, capital rules, and identity checks ahead of the House debate.

The post Trump-Backed GENIUS Act Under Fire: NYAG Urges Tougher Stablecoin Rules Before July Vote appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Eskom Eyes Bitcoin Mining & AI to Tackle $22.7B Debt – Can the Lights Stay On?
item.description:
Eskom has mapped a long-term plan that includes Bitcoin mining, artificial intelligence and data centres to absorb surplus baseload electricity and stem financial decline. The utility has seen a 4% sales drop in 2023 and faces a R403 billion debt while municipal arrears mount to R90 billion.

The post Eskom Eyes Bitcoin Mining & AI to Tackle $22.7B Debt – Can the Lights Stay On? appeared first on Cryptonews.
